title: Particle motion from graph of v part - b

content.question: For how many values of t, where 0 ≤ t≤ 6 , is the particle at x = −8 ? Explain your reasoning.

frqParts.text: For how many values of t, where 0 ≤ t≤ 6 , is the particle at x = −8 ? Explain your reasoning.

topic.text: 1.16: Working with the Intermediate Value Theorem (IVT)

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
